page.title: 18WILD LIFE
page.content: I am doing a project on nature. The things that I will be doing are animals,birds,flowers and trees.I will also be going to Clyst Vale Library to find reference books.We have four acres of ground so we have a lot of wildlife in it:wood pigeon, water vole, foxes, deer, wood pecker, cuckoo, mice, crows, moles and butterflies. There are wild animals in Britain, some of them are red foxes, badgers, roe deer, hedgehogs, moles, grey and red squirrels, rabbits, brown hares, wood mice, common shrews, pheasants and short tailed voles.They live in woods,long grass,hedgegrows or swamp land .Wild animals are frightened of people. In our garden we have seen the robin, thrush,wren, snipe, blackbird and starling.
